beer.beer_description: Com Syrup e Levedura belga, uma fusion beer entre a escola belga e americana. Com notas frutadas generosas, porém com leve toffe  característico belga.

Elaborada com uma adição especial de Syrup Belga e levedura trapista, essa cerveja demonstra a alma Belga mas de uma forma leve. Tem como característica uma ótima presença de malte, aveia e trigo, que são percebidos tanto no sabor quanto no corpo e na espuma.

user.bio: Beersommelier Doemens Akademie e Escola Superior de Cerveja e Malte / Beer Maniac \,,/

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 60 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more Level 13!

user.bio: Beersommelier Doemens Akademie e Escola Superior de Cerveja e Malte / Beer Maniac \,,/

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 15 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 4!

user.bio: Beersommelier Doemens Akademie e Escola Superior de Cerveja e Malte / Beer Maniac \,,/

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 45 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale. Try 5 more for Level 10!

user.bio: Beersommelier Doemens Akademie e Escola Superior de Cerveja e Malte / Beer Maniac \,,/
